messages.content:
1.   A robotic fur ball wearing a striped tee, with silver hoop earrings and an orange background.
2.   A robot with a discomforted mouth, wearing a striped tee, with silver hoop earrings and an orange background.
3.   A robotic fur ball wearing a striped tee, with silver hoop earrings, an orange background and robot fur.
